exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on the bench. Grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width. Lower the bar to your chest, then push back up.

exercises.name: Push Ups
exercises.instructions: Keep your body in a straight line. Lower your chest to the floor and push back up.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.instructions: Set bench to 45 degrees. Press dumbbells up from chest level until arms are extended.

exercises.name: Cable Flys
exercises.instructions: Stand between pulleys. Pull handles together in front of chest with a slight bend in elbows.

exercises.name: Pull Ups
exercises.instructions: Grip the bar wider than shoulders. Pull your body up until your chin is over the bar.

exercises.name: Bent Over Barbell Row
exercises.instructions: Bend at hips, keeping back straight. Pull barbell to your lower chest/upper abs.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.instructions: Sit at machine. Pull the bar down to your upper chest while squeezing your shoulder blades.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.instructions: Sit with knees slightly bent. Pull handle to your stomach, keeping back straight.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Press the barbell from shoulders up over your head.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides. Raise arms out to the side until parallel with the floor.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.instructions: Using a rope attachment, pull the weight towards your forehead, flaring elbows out.

exercises.name: Barbell Curl
exercises.instructions: Stand straight. Curl the barbell towards your chest, keeping elbows pinned to sides.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing each other. Curl weights up without rotating wrists.

exercises.name: Preacher Curl
exercises.instructions: Sit at preacher bench. Curl the weight up while keeping upper arms firmly on the pad.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.instructions: Lower your body on parallel bars until elbows are at 90 degrees, then push up.

exercises.name: Skullcrushers
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench. Lower EZ-bar to forehead by bending elbows, then extend arms.

exercises.name: Cable Pushdowns
exercises.instructions: Push the cable attachment down until arms are fully extended, keeping elbows tight.

exercises.name: Barbell Squat
exercises.instructions: Place bar on upper back. Squat down until thighs are parallel to floor, then drive up.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.instructions: Sit in machine. Lower the platform until knees are at 90 degrees, then press back up.

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step forward with one leg, lowering hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.instructions: Sit in machine. Extend legs until straight, focusing on squeezing the quads.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Hinge at hips with slight knee bend. Lower bar along legs until stretch is felt, then pull up.

exercises.name: Seated Leg Curl
exercises.instructions: Sit in machine. Curl legs under the pad towards your glutes.

exercises.name: Lying Leg Curl
exercises.instructions: Lie face down. Curl heels towards glutes using the machine pad.

exercises.name: Hip Thrusts
exercises.instructions: Back against bench, bar on hips. Thrust hips upward until body is flat, squeeze glutes.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, knees bent. Lift hips off floor until body forms straight line.

exercises.name: Cable Kickbacks
exercises.instructions: Attach ankle cuff to cable. Kick leg back and up, squeezing the glute at the top.

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
exercises.instructions: Stand on edge of step. Lower heels down, then raise up onto toes as high as possible.

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raise
exercises.instructions: Sit at machine with pads on knees. Raise heels by extending ankles.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold body in straight line resting on forearms and toes. Keep core tight.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.instructions: Lie on back. Curl upper body towards knees, squeezing abs. Do not pull on neck.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raises
exercises.instructions: Hang from pull-up bar. Raise legs until parallel to floor (or higher) without swinging.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.instructions: Sit with feet off ground. Twist torso side to side, touching floor with hands/weight.
